SELECT `create_time` AS 'date_range', GROUP_CONCAT(`pay_type_name`) AS 'category', GROUP_CONCAT(`local_full_name`) AS 'local', SUM( CAST( `real_price` AS DECIMAL ( 10, 2 )) ) AS 'consumption_amount', COUNT( `bill_id` ) AS 'consumption_volume' FROM `oa_bill` WHERE `logic_del` = 1
GROUP BY DAY(`create_time`)
GROUP BY MONTH(`create_time`)
GROUP BY YEAR(`create_time`)
GROUP BY `pay_type_id`
GROUP BY `bill_type_id`
GROUP BY `local_last_id`

SELECT ob.bill_id, ob.bill_goods_name, ob.bill_desc, ob.real_price, ob.bill_shop, ob.local_last_id, oa.area_full_code, oa.area_full_name, ob.pay_type_id, ob.pay_type_name, ob.bill_type_id, ob.bill_type_name, ob.create_by, ob.create_time FROM oa_bill ob LEFT JOIN oa_area oa ON ob.local_last_id = oa.area_code
and ob.logic_del = 1
